scripts.test: karma start tests/karma.conf.js && npm run remap-istanbul
scripts._comment: We use remap, because we can cover the igniteui.angular2.js file, but we want to see what is being covered on the igniteui.angular2.ts file
main remap command and removes temporary files resulted from karma-coverage of the igniteui.angular2.js file
scripts.remap-istanbul: npm run copy-coverage-report && npm run remap-istanbul-html && npm run remap-istanbul-json
scripts._comment: copy the coverage.json from karma-coverage, because the folder resulted from karma coverage is not always the same
scripts.prepare-dist: cp src/igniteui.angular2.js dist/npm/ && cp src/igniteui.d.ts dist/npm/ && cp src/jquery.d.ts dist/npm/
